caption.center: MARY ALLEN, Respondent, v. JOHN C. ALLEN and Another, Appellants.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Motion for a reargument denied, with ten dollars costs; motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied.
